sentences.en: As women were not permitted in the war zone, Eleanor would have to stay behind.
sentences.cn: 女性是不允许进入战区的，所以埃莉诺不得不留在后方。

sentences.en: Because it is in an enterprise zone, taxes on non-food items are 3.5% instead of the usual 7%.
sentences.cn: 因为是在创业园区，非食品类产品的税率是3.5%，而不是通常的7%。

sentences.en: Do not enter the danger zone!
Germany 's resurgence has set a challenge for the euro zone's southern members .
sentences.cn: 德国的复苏已经挑战了欧元区南部成员。

sentences.en: How is the economic development zone going on?
sentences.cn: 现在经济开发区怎样了?

sentences.en: I just zoned out for a moment.
Near the border zone an important string of nickeliferous peridotites is emplaced.
sentences.cn: 在靠近交界带上有重要的一连串的含镍橄榄岩(体)的侵入.

sentences.en: Norvelle, whose catchphrase is "Chase Me", asked magistrates not to ban him after he admitted doing 83mph in a 50mph zone.
sentences.cn: 喜欢把“追我啊”挂在嘴边的诺维尔承认在限速50英里的地段开到了83英里/小时，并请求地方治安官不要吊销他的驾驶证。

sentences.en: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.cn: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.en: Strathclyde council has declared itself a nuclear-free zone.
sentences.cn: 斯特拉思克莱德区委员会宣布本区为无核区。

sentences.en: The area has been declared a disaster zone.
sentences.cn: 这个地区已经被宣布为灾难地带。

sentences.en: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.cn: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

sentences.en: The land is currently zoned for residential use.
sentences.cn: 这片土地目前被划为住宅用地。

sentences.en: The region has been declared an ecological disaster zone.
sentences.cn: 这个地区已经宣布为生态灾难区.

sentences.en: The two varieties intergrade over a narrow transition zone.
sentences.cn: 这两个变种在较窄的过渡地带有中间类型.

sentences.en: They fell into that twilight zone between military personnel and civilian employees.
sentences.cn: 他们成了军队人员与平民雇员之间身份界定不清的人。

sentences.en: to provide humanitarian aid to the war zone
sentences.cn: 给战区提供人道主义援助

sentences.en: We had accidentally strayed into the war zone.
sentences.cn: 我们走错路意外地闯进了作战区.

sentences.en: We overflew the war zone, taking photographs.

phrases.tran_cn: 死区（电波不能到达的地区）；盲区；静区
经济特区；经济圈；经济地带
(美，非正式)入睡；走神；失去意识

trans.tran_en: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way
if an area of land is zoned, it is officially kept separate from other land so that it can be used for a particular purpose
